TopicTitle: The one thing that really grinds your gears.

Articles.Content:
We all have it, the single thing we hate more than anything. Could be anything from losing your keys to... being shot at?

For me it has to be seeing people who are just minding their own business getting picked on and bullied. I once saw a boy picking on a young Pakistani girl and using some horrible terms. I grabbed his hand, sprained his wrist and broke 2 fingers.

What about you guys? Anything that really gets you going?

Oh and

>mfw
<12 year old kids with microphones on multiplayer FPS. ugh...
Any sort of injustice.

<12 year old kids with microphones on multiplayer FPS. ugh...

Good thing I don't do FPS videos.
Clueless people or anything that can induce a facepalm.

http://www.theflatearthsociety.org/forum/index.php

I don't wanna live in this planet anymore! D:

http://www.theflatearthsociety.org/forum/index.php

I don't wanna live in this planet anymore! D:

I tried so hard to forget that. WHY DO YOU DO THIS!?
Bullies of any form. My entire life has been full of them, and I completely believe that they are sub-humans unworthy of their continued existence.

Bullies of any form. My entire life has been full of them, and I completely believe that they are sub-humans unworthy of their continued existence.

...I love you for what you just said.
People who are consistently hypocritical.
Decisions ,and high pitched noises.

People who can't be bothered to do simple things correctly.

Parking.

Spelling and grammar.

Wearing pants.

What really grinds my gears?

People who can't properly drive a standard.

What really grinds my gears?

People who can't properly drive a standard.

How about people who can't drive period. Can't merge, tailgate, slam the gas to go 40 feet, pass and cut off 20 feet before their turn, talking on their phone, texting on their phone, and worst of all responding to turn signals on the interstate by purposefully closing the gap so you cannot change lane.

How about people who can't drive period. Can't merge, tailgate, slam the gas to go 40 feet, pass and cut off 20 feet before their turn, talking on their phone, texting on their phone, and worst of all responding to turn signals on the interstate by purposefully closing the gap so you cannot change lane.

I hate when there's a separated fast lane and people decide to use it to drive below the speed limit.

People who argue in complete logical loops all the time or simply progress nowhere in their argument at all, ie.

"This is my opinion:"

"Why?

"This is what I think:"

"Yes, but what are the reasons for such a thing?"

"In my opinion..."

Sometimes take out the opinion.

Oh, and people who know they are bigots and terrible people and simply don't care as if acknowledging it justifies their behaviour.

Edited June 5, 2013 by Kerbface

One Acronym: PETA.

*facepalms* don't get me started.
A 15 year old kid that has the gall to tell me how I should be painting my fan-art series
I got one a new one.....when my skype calls become 4th of July ,but with more static ,and pops.

Ignore this or if possible, delete it.

Edited June 5, 2013 by Rage097

I'm naturally quiet until you get into a subject I'm know of or you just start talking to me.

so I think it's really rude when somebody ignores me when I haven't said a whole lot or upset them

Edited June 5, 2013 by Mr. Rogue Ace
In <Insert multiplayer game here> A competitive player plays on a public/new player server and ruins it for the other players just to get a high score.-Pubstomping
Terrible trolling! XD

Most probably a multiplayer game with mics. With an 8 year old screaming into the mic.

With no mute button.
People who don't practice what they preach.
